trans-unit.source: Represents the length of elements that explicitly support <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star" /> unit types.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la lunghezza di elementi che in modo esplicito supportano i tipi dell'unità <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star" />.

trans-unit.source: Elements such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> use this type to describe width and height in order to support variable distribution of available space.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> utilizzare questo tipo per descrivere la larghezza e altezza per supportare la distribuzione variabile dello spazio disponibile.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *doubleLength*
trans-unit.target: *doubleLength*

trans-unit.source: The element’s length, described as either a <xref:System.Double> value that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] measure, or as a *qualifiedDouble* (see below).
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza dell'elemento, designata come un <xref:System.Double> valore che specifica un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] misura, o come un *qualifiedDouble* (vedere sotto).

trans-unit.source: *autoValue*
trans-unit.target: *autoValue*

trans-unit.source: The element's length, described by either the value Auto or *.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza dell'elemento, descritto mediante il valore Auto o *.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> for more information on the values Auto and *.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> per ulteriori informazioni sui valori automatico e *.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above for any of the measures, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto *doppie* come descritto in precedenza per tutte le misure, seguito da una delle seguenti stringhe di dichiarazione di unità: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` (impostazione predefinita) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` è pollici; in 1 = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` centimetri; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` punti; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of device-independent pixels (96 pixels-per-inch).
trans-unit.target: Numero di pixel indipendenti dal dispositivo (96 pixel-per-pollice).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure using the specified absolute value in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> utilizzando il valore assoluto specificato in pixel.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="Pixels" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="Pixels" /> è uguale a <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, oppure a <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore iniziale di questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> held by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> utilizzato da questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure and specifies what kind of value it holds.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> e specifica quale tipo di valore utilizza.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è uguale a <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, oppure a <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> that holds a value whose size is determined by the size properties of the content object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> che utilizza un valore la cui dimensione è determinata dalle proprietà della dimensione dell'oggetto contenuto.

trans-unit.source: A instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> la cui proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> è impostata su <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due strutture <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare con l'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato è uguale all'istanza corrente della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object has the same value and <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> as the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’oggetto specificato ha lo stesso valore e <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> dell’istanza corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da confrontare con l’istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> specificato è uguale all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> has the same value and <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> as the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> specificato ha lo stesso valore e <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> dell’istanza corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un codice hash per <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per la struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto associato <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> holds a value that is expressed in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> utilizza un valore espresso in pixel.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Pixel" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Pixel" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> holds a value whose size is determined by the size properties of the content object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> utilizza un valore la cui dimensione è determinata dalle proprietà della dimensione dell'oggetto contenuto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType%2A> value is <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType%2A> valore <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this property returns `true` if you do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> when creating the instance.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, questa proprietà restituisce `true` se non si specifica un <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> quando si crea l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> holds a value that is expressed as a weighted proportion of available space.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> utilizza un valore espresso come una proporzione ponderata di spazio disponibile.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.GridLength.GridUnitType" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due strutture <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> per determinare se sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> have the same value and <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> hanno lo stesso valore e <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structures to determine if they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due strutture <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> per stabilire se non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> do not have the same value and <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> non hanno lo stesso valore e <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridUnitType" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una rappresentazione <see cref="T:System.String" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Una rappresentazione <see cref="T:System.String" /> della struttura corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta il valore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta il valore dell'istanza corrente.
